name: Cobra Kai 2: Dojos Rising
overview: Cobra Kai 2: Dojos Rising is a side-scrolling beat 'em-up video game which is a sequel to Cobra Kai: The Karate Kid Saga Continues which is based on the American web television series Cobra Kai, in turn based on the film franchise The Karate Kid, developed by Brazilian studio Flux Game Studio and published by GameMill Entertainment in North America and Maximum Games in Europe.
